Name: The Terminator
Plot: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation

Name: The Shawshank Redemption
Plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency

Name: Hackers
Plot: Hackers are blamed for making a virus that will capsize five oil tankers.

Name: Cube
Plot: Six complete strangers with widely varying personalities are involuntarily placed in an endless maze containing deadly traps.

Name: The Ring
Plot: A journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone one week to the day after they view it

Name: Django Unchained
Plot: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi

Name: Casablanca
Plot: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco

Name: Hercules in New York
Plot: Hercules is sent to Earth where he finds true love and starts a promising career in the bodybuilder business

Name: The Matrix
Plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence

Name: WarGames
Plot: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III
